CatDescriptText: Mr. Claude Fisher, musician 2823 Webster Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 12, 1957, pg. 2 with question: "Do you think the Little Rock, Ark. school integration incident will gain more financial support for the NAACP in its continuing fight for equal rights?"  Answer reads: "I think it will help the NAACP. I would imagine that any organization which moves to help the race as a whole should gain support."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Claude Fisher wearing eyeglasses and hat, standing in front of building with billboards in background
